commentBody:
Come on, Wesley. I read your stuff regularly at grantland. Jeff Weaver's comment was in response to a leader asking him to describe her as a "craven hypocrite" and an "opportunist." If he had agreed with that you'd be saying he was hostile like "Bernie bros," instead his joking response which deflected that negativity is sexist? You're way too smart to be leaving out that sort of context.

Also the newspaper you now work for is not helping levels of hostility in this election when articles like this are published pretty strongly alleging outright editorial bias https://www.rollingstone.com/politics/news/how-the-new-york-times-sandba...

As someone I came to respect I would really love to hear what you think about the editing decisions made. Because of behavior like that people will question the motives of this piece, fairly or unfairly, especially considering the way-too-convenient similarities to the Obama boys label that were thrown at Obama supporters in 2008.
